text: this impression I had of him was one of several reasons why I had decided I should leave it - before for me too, it would be too late. I used the excuse of our early start in the morning to retire as soon as it seemed prudent to do so, after the coffee and brandy, already anticipating the familiar pleasures awaiting me.
